name: pm2-zabbix
description: ### Create file pm2-status.conf in /etc/zabbix/zabbix_agentd.conf.d $ sudo nano /etc/zabbix/zabbix_agentd.conf.d/pm2-status.conf ``` UserParameter=pm2.discovery,/usr/local/bin/node /etc/zabbix/script/pm2-zabbix/pm2.js UserParameter=pm2.status[*],/usr/local/bin/node /etc/zabbix/script/pm2-zabbix/pm2.js $1 ```
author: Fillipi Nascimento
